description:
Who doesn’t love a nice surprise? With the Del Dia Todo tote, you’ll get the best of both worlds with a tote and backpack, in beautiful colours that is different for everyone. With stowable pack straps, a laptop sleeve and a fleece-lined pocket, you’ll want to bring this little ray of sunshine to the other side of the world, and back again.

  • Made of repurposed polyester and nylon that is durable and saves it going to the landfill
  • Zippered main compartment keeps your things stowed away so you’re free to pop it down without anything falling out
  • Backpack straps can tuck neatly behind the back panel so you can grab groceries or office essentials anyway you like
  • Daisy chain webbing allows you to clip your bottle or hat, for quick access when the sun comes to say hello
name: Cotopaxi Todo Convertible Tote - Unisex
